scripts.dev: nodemon --exec "yarn build-css && yarn dev-build-elm && parcel index.html"
scripts.build: yarn build-css && yarn build-elm && parcel build index.html
scripts.dev-mobile: yarn build-css && yarn dev-build-elm && parcel build index.html && yarn capacitor copy android && yarn capacitor open android
scripts.build-android: yarn build && yarn capacitor copy android && yarn capacitor open android
scripts.custom: yarn dev-build-elm && parcel build index.html && yarn cap copy android && yarn cap open android
